ygData.subject: Re: getting PK'ed
ygData.msgSnippet: ok ok ,, syl ,, I get your point ,,,,   I ve been avoiding EK because of PK s ,,,  btw bruhda ,,,  I HIT 19 tonight ,,, :) ,,, cya later Bro ... From: Greg
ygData.messageBody:
ok ok ,, syl ,, I get your point ,,,, I've been avoiding EK because of
PK's ,,, btw bruhda ,,, I HIT 19 tonight ,,, :) ,,,

cya later Bro

----- Original Message -----
From: Greg <sylvan1@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 22, 1999 12:29 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] getting PK'ed


> From: "Greg" <sylvan1@...>
>
> Well Nokk...
>
> I havent been PK'd since level 5 and that was me at half health jumping on
a
> yellow mage for the hell of it. Trick to the game is find a spot, stick
> with it till they are blue then move on. There is no magical place where
> your going to find a 17th level monster that drops 10 plat. Aint gonna
> happen. Get your butt back to EK and stay there till you get crap for xp.
> Then move on. The trick is to stay with it and know your turf. Most of the
> PK's don't even bother with me because I'm not an easy kill. The secret?
> RUN! Know thy turf....
>
> Kolin
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Robert "Nokker" Venters <dread@...>
> To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Date: Monday, June 21, 1999 7:30 PM
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] getting PK'ed
>
>
> >From: "Robert \"Nokker\" Venters" <dread@...>
> >
> >> Since you apparently are a person who has been PK'd, I have some
> questions
> >> about how PK works. Not that I would ever play that way, I hated UO
for
> >> that one reason. It's bad enough we got insta kill monsters, having to
> >> worry about them, and other players attacking make it way to
complicated
> >for
> >> me.
> >>
> >> Anyways, if you PK someone, how much can you loot? Everything?
> >> Percentages, etc.
> >> also in a duel, if you win, what are you allowed to loot off the other
> >> player? Items? Money? Nothing?
> >>
> >> I realize this is the wrong forum for theses questions, but dang it,
I've
> >> been curious.
> >>
> >> Thanks,
> >>
> >> Wenaddar of Cazic-Thule (16th level)
> >>
> >the rules for a pk are the same as looting rules for a duel ,,
> >you are able to loot anything that is equipped ,, or in an open inventory
> >slot ,,, plus all the money on the corpse ,,,
> >
> >I was pk'ed by what is called a "naked mage" actually a Dark Elf
wizard
> >,,, they carry absolutely nothing on them ,, and bag all the loot that
> they
> >get ,, if I were to kill him ,,, if I could kill him,,, all I would get
is
> >what gold he took off my corpse ,,, never get my tunic back ,,, I died
at
> >the entrance to HHP in kith woods ,, my spawn point was just inside the
HHP
> >zone ,, I was hunting orcs ,, by the time I made it back ,,, just about
> 30
> >seconds ,,, the brigand had enough time to loot my corpse and gate out
,,,,
> >oh well ,,, a new tunic will cost me a total of 5pp to get ,,,, just
the
> >fact that it happened ,,, that's not race war roleplaying ,,, that's
pure
> >greed ,,,
> >
> >i'm sorry ,, this really isn't the forum for this discussion ,, but I
tend
> >to ramble
> >
> >
> >
